p: As to potentially effective therapies, there are several trials to assess their safety and efficacy as potential treatments for COVID-19, such as antivirals, systemic interferons, non-steroidal anti-inflammatories, dexamethasone, chloroquine/hydroxychloroquine, and monoclonal antibodies against interleukin-6 (IL-6) and IL-4 18, 19, 20 ( https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/covid-19/latest-evidence/vaccines-and-treatment).
